text:
Happen to try this BCM stall

Really a big surprised

Noodles nicely done
Ingredients especially the liver well cooked
Taste is great

My 2nd visit back to back days.
Base price is $4.
My 2nd time, added noodles = $5

Satisfying breakfast!!!

23th August Friday
👍🏼 My third time here. Still as before
Super tasty
No kidding at all. Remember to ask for more pork lards

Fuuyooo. Pork liver my fav!! The colour can tell this liver is cook perfect. The portion is rather small for my size, but it’s $4 only. Can ask for much.. they topping with small grain size fry garlic to enhance the flavour, to me is a plus point.. Generous bits of pork lard.. nices…Soup is tasty too. 👍🏻👍🏻 Another hearty meal nearby my home . Will come back again..
Really satisfying. Noodles and ingredients are cooked just nice especially the liver, portions are good

Tried the minced meat noodle (mee pok with chilli).  Shiok!  The best I have ever tried👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻.
Pai seh.  Forgot to take photo.
Good food! Nice soup too! Reasonable and affordable 👍🏻
